Our Consumers


Our Service

Your Logistic Service Partner

Road Transport

We provide a wide range of land transportation services 24x7 to any location. Our efficient local and national land transportation service makes sure that items arrive on schedule and in good condition.

Full Load Truck

Full truck loads are almost always the fastest and safest option to move heavy freight. This is true because only during loading and unloading will the goods be handled, and they will be on a specific vehicle.

Part Load Truck

PTL makes it simple to transport various items of clients in one vehicle. This enables numerous shippers to split their load and pay for the specific area that they occupy, making it an affordable way to move products.

Cargo Storage

R. O. Logistics is a top Logistic Company in India, provides a wide selection of tech-based warehousing solutions that are all 100% customised to match the unique demands of your company.

About Us

Simplify Your Logistics, Amplify Your Success With Our Efficient Logistics Services.

We are a trusted logistics partner that provides customized solutions to meet your unique business needs. With years of experience in the industry, we have established ourselves as a reliable and efficient logistics provider.

Our staff at C2C Logistics will organise every aspect of each road shipment, from the optimal route to the required vehicle. With the use of readily available vehicles of all sizes and forms, we can deliver anything from small courier vans to low loaders, tail lift trucks, box and curtain-sided vehicles, and skeleton trucks that can carry especially huge or odd items.

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I speak by telephone with your specialist?

Yes, you can talk to our specialists if you have any inquiries at our customer support number, i.e., +91 8094808061.

Where is the company location?

Our head office location is in Mumbai, and we also have branches in other parts of the country, like Bangalore, Pune, Ahemdabad, and Vadodra.
